If the shipping charge stated is less than $3.50, the item is shipped via first class mail which is normally 2 to 4 days to anywhere in the USA. There is no delivery confirmation available on this and packages in rare instances have taken up to two weeks to arrive (way less than 1% of the time). Items.Name: AEF Aliens AM-11 Ferro Original Issue
Items.Description: IMPORTANT!: Please read ALL the information below if you intend to bid or use Buy It Now for this item. AEF"s 1/35 resin Aliens line from the late 80"s/early 90"s was probably the most extensive US model kit line based on a science fiction film, EVER, kitting nearly every character, and nearly every *situation*, from that film! They were also designed to be compatible with the British company Halcyon"s 1/35 APC kit released at the same time. Also, most of the kits featured extra sets of arms, legs, heads and torso parts to allow the figures to be posed in several different ways during assembly. This kit of Ferro features two heads (one with sunglasses and one without), two sets of arms and legs, flight helmut, clipboard, hand gun (in and out of holster), an 11-piece dropship seat, and base. Ferro can be posed standing or sitting. Instructions feature a painting guide and personnel report on Ferro. Comes in a resealable ziploc bag with header card, which has been opened by me. Kit is complete and in excellent shape. See my other auctions for more kits in the AEF Aliens line! Please bid with intent to follow through. Winning bidders who do not follow through WILL find thenselves with negative feedback. Also, at this time users with less than 5 positive feedbacks are not allowed to bid on this item (This includes users of Buy It Now). I"m sorry to do this but I"ve had too many auctions end up with a less than 5 pos. feedback user not following through. I may change back in future auctions, but unfortunately this what I"m doing right now, with apologies to all the honest users out there. High bidders or Buy It Now purchasers, as described above, will have their bids cancelled or their purchases considered void, and will be required to pay back my insertion fees for that item. I also reserve the right to cancel bids by users whom I feel have excessive negative feedback I accept payment by personal check, money order, and credit card payments made through www.paypal.com. The email address needed to pay through Paypal can be found by clicking on my eBay name, zed209, once the auction ends. Please note that items paid by personal check will be held 10 working days until check clears, I"m very sorry, no exceptions If you are thinking of signing with Paypal to pay for this item, please be aware that processing your membership may take 1-2 weeks and may not be timely enough for this auction. Payment must be recieved within 7 days after end of auction. Buyer agrees to pay $5.00 for handling, insurance, tracking, and priority mail if in the United States. International buyers, please inquire about air and surface shipping and I will obtain quotes for you. Item should ship within 1-5 days after receipt of money order, clearance of check, or transfer of funds into my account by paypal. If you have any questions or comments, please don"t hesitate to email me and I"ll do my best to answer them. Thank you for looking, and take care! Image Hosting @ BayPal BayPal

Items.Name: AEF Aliens Jorden Family Original Issue
Items.Description: IMPORTANT!: Please read ALL the information below if you intend to bid or use Buy It Now for this item. AEF"s 1/35 resin Aliens line from the late 80"s/early 90"s was probably the most extensive US model kit line based on a science fiction film, EVER, kitting nearly every character, and nearly every *situation*, from that film! They were also designed to be compatible with the British company Halcyon"s 1/35 APC kit released at the same time. This kit features Newt"s family members - father Russ, mother Ann, and brother Timmy - from the "Derelict Discovery" scene that was cut for theatrical release and later restored for laserdisc and DVD. Included are a sitting Timmy with tractor seat, and standing Ann and Russ with what may be flashlights, one alien egg (closed), and two bases. There are no instructions. One reason for this may be because this set was issued near the end of AEF"s license and they may simply not had time. Comes in a resealable ziploc bag with header card, which has been opened by me. Kit is complete and in excellent shape. See my other auctions for more kits in the AEF Aliens line! Please bid with intent to follow through. Winning bidders who do not follow through WILL find thenselves with negative feedback. Also, at this time users with less than 5 positive feedbacks are not allowed to bid on this item (This includes users of Buy It Now). I"m sorry to do this but I"ve had too many auctions end up with a less than 5 pos. feedback user not following through. I may change back in future auctions, but unfortunately this what I"m doing right now, with apologies to all the honest users out there. High bidders or Buy It Now purchasers, as described above, will have their bids cancelled or their purchases considered void, and will be required to pay back my insertion fees for that item. I also reserve the right to cancel bids by users whom I feel have excessive negative feedback I accept payment by personal check, money order, and credit card payments made through www.paypal.com. The email address needed to pay through Paypal can be found by clicking on my eBay name, zed209, once the auction ends. Please note that items paid by personal check will be held 10 working days until check clears, I"m very sorry, no exceptions If you are thinking of signing with Paypal to pay for this item, please be aware that processing your membership may take 1-2 weeks and may not be timely enough for this auction. Payment must be recieved within 7 days after end of auction. Buyer agrees to pay $5.00 for handling, insurance, tracking, and priority mail if in the United States. International buyers, please inquire about air and surface shipping and I will obtain quotes for you. Item should ship within 1-5 days after receipt of money order, clearance of check, or transfer of funds into my account by paypal. If you have any questions or comments, please don"t hesitate to email me and I"ll do my best to answer them. Thank you for looking, and take care! Image Hosting @ BayPal BayPal
